review: Works best with Prime, lots of free stuff to watch!!!
author: Norsegirl

review: We really like this.  We were watching netflix thorough our blu ray player but it didn't do amazon.  We watched amazon through our wii but the interface was awkward.  I like having both on the fire tv stick and the interface is nice.  still figuring out all the extras but so far this has exceeded my expectations
author: Amazon Customer "Tracy"

review: This is a great tool and I really am happy I purchased it and now all our TV's are smart TVs
author: Adams Ribs

review: It s nice I just wish it would have xfinity TV

review: It was not what I expected, I thought I was going to get tons money , but the forgot to said, that I have to by movies and Amazon prime.. Satisfied
author: pascual oneal

review: It was no different than the Roku I had bought.  The Fire TV Stick lead me to believe that I could mirror what was on my PC to the TV wirelessly, which is why I bought it, but it did not, so I returned it.
author: Tamera Simonson

review: This Fire TV Stick works really well on my Samsung TV.  I am very happy with it.
